Step Description: 1. Enter valid username and password, 2. Click on the Login button
Expected Result: Successful login and redirect to dashboard

Step Description: 1. Enter invalid username and password, 2. Click on the Login button
Expected Result: Failed login and display error message

Step Description: 1. Leave both username and password fields blank, 2. Click on the Login button
Expected Result: Failed login and display error message

Step Description: 1. Enter null value in username and password fields, 2. Click on the Login button
Expected Result: Failed login and display error message

Step Description: 1. Enter username and password with special characters, 2. Click on the Login button
Expected Result: Successful login and redirect to dashboard

Step Description: 1. Enter a large string as the username, 2. Click on the Login button
Expected Result: Successful login and redirect to dashboard without any issues

Step Description: 1. Enter a large string as the password, 2. Click on the Login button
Expected Result: Successful login and redirect to dashboard without any issues

Summary: Edge case: Valid username with invalid password
Step Description: 1. Enter a valid username but an invalid password, 2. Click on the Login button
Expected Result: Failed login and display error message

Summary: Negative test case: Valid username with valid password
Step Description: 1. Enter a valid username and a valid password, 2. Click on the Login button
Expected Result: Successful login and redirect to dashboard without any security issues

Step Description: 1. Open multiple browser tabs and perform login simultaneously, 2. Monitor system performance
Expected Result: System handles multiple concurrent logins without any performance issues
